header.title: Ruby on Rails Developer · Release Manager

summary.text: Software Developer specialized in backend development and system architecture, with strong experience in Ruby on Rails, CI/CD, and cloud environments (AWS). I have defined deployment processes for multidisciplinary teams (over 80 repositories), optimized critical jobs to improve performance by up to 250%, and designed scalable data pipelines (Airflow → data lake → data storage) that power core applications and integrations. I combine high technical rigor with collaborative leadership to elevate team performance and deliver reliable, maintainable systems.

forusall.title: ForUsAll — Software Engineer
achievements: Designed and implemented an Airflow-based architecture to feed a data lake and transform it into a data storage powering the main application and multiple integrations.
Refactored a critical +500-line job into 5 modular components, eliminating production errors and improving performance by ~250%.
Contributed to product definitions, proposing scalable, low-maintenance solutions aligned with business goals.

abatech_rm.title: ABATECH — Software Release Manager
achievements: Defined and implemented release and deployment processes for multidisciplinary teams, managing 80+ active repositories.
Worked across architectures: microfrontends, AWS Lambdas, monoliths, and microservices.
Coordinated frontend, backend, and DevOps teams to align release schedules, resolve blockers, and ensure smooth deployments.

abatech_dev.title: ABATECH — Back End Developer
achievements: Built and maintained backend services in Ruby on Rails, improving the reliability and performance of core features.
Integrated CI/CD with Jenkins and GitHub Actions to streamline deployments and reduce failures.
Enhanced system observability and error handling, contributing to faster incident resolution.

cobelen.title: Cobelén — Web Developer (Apolo ERP)
achievements: Refactored a high-volume yearly accounting process to generate government reports, significantly improving performance and compliance.
Implemented a materialized view updated by scheduled jobs, enabling fast, reliable report generation in strict legal formats.
Maintained and enhanced ERP features with a focus on backend performance and data integrity.

makeitreal.title: Make It Real Camp
makeitreal.description: Completed an intensive online program focused on the Ruby on Rails framework, following the full-stack learning path provided by Make It Real. Developed a proactive approach to continuous learning, expanding technical knowledge and problem-solving skills.

uniminuto.title: Uniminuto
uniminuto.description: Began academic training in computer technology with a focus on information and communication technologies for development. Strengthened foundational knowledge in programming and web development, fostering an early commitment to becoming a professional developer.
